_description: WixUI extension dialog sets and customization reference

dialog_sets.name: Minimal
dialog_sets.description: Welcome and license agreement dialogs only. No user configuration options.
dialog_sets.use_case: Simple installers with no user choices

dialog_sets.name: Install Directory
dialog_sets.description: Adds installation directory selection to Minimal set.
dialog_sets.use_case: When users need to choose installation folder

dialog_sets.name: Feature Tree
dialog_sets.description: Displays features in a tree for selection. No install directory choice.

dialog_sets.name: Mondo
dialog_sets.description: Full UI with Typical/Custom/Complete install types, feature tree, and directory selection.
dialog_sets.use_case: Enterprise software with many configuration options

dialog_sets.name: Advanced
dialog_sets.description: Adds per-user/per-machine choice to InstallDir. Supports both installation scopes.
dialog_sets.use_case: Software that supports both per-user and per-machine installation

standard_dialogs.name: Welcome Dialog
standard_dialogs.description: First dialog showing product name and version. Offers Next and Cancel buttons.

standard_dialogs.name: License Agreement Dialog
standard_dialogs.description: Displays license text with accept/decline radio buttons.
standard_dialogs.notes: Set WixUILicenseRtf to path of RTF license file

standard_dialogs.name: Install Directory Dialog
standard_dialogs.description: Allows user to choose installation directory with Browse button.

standard_dialogs.name: Customize Dialog
standard_dialogs.description: Feature tree for selecting which features to install.

standard_dialogs.name: Setup Type Dialog
standard_dialogs.description: Choose between Typical, Custom, and Complete installation types.

standard_dialogs.name: Verify Ready Dialog
standard_dialogs.description: Summary dialog before installation begins. Shows selected options.

standard_dialogs.name: Progress Dialog
standard_dialogs.description: Shows installation progress with status text and progress bar.

standard_dialogs.name: Exit Dialog
standard_dialogs.description: Final dialog after installation completes. Can include launch checkbox.

standard_dialogs.name: Maintenance Type Dialog
standard_dialogs.description: Shown for installed products. Offers Change, Repair, or Remove.

standard_dialogs.name: Maintenance Welcome Dialog
standard_dialogs.description: Welcome dialog for maintenance mode (modify/repair/remove).

standard_dialogs.name: Install Scope Dialog
standard_dialogs.description: Choose between per-user and per-machine installation. WixUI_Advanced only.

standard_dialogs.name: Browse Dialog
standard_dialogs.description: Folder browser for selecting installation directory.

standard_dialogs.name: Disk Cost Dialog
standard_dialogs.description: Shows disk space requirements by volume.

standard_dialogs.name: Error Dialog
standard_dialogs.description: Displays error messages during installation.

standard_dialogs.name: Fatal Error Dialog
standard_dialogs.description: Shown when installation fails catastrophically.

standard_dialogs.name: User Exit Dialog
standard_dialogs.description: Shown when user cancels installation.

standard_dialogs.name: Files In Use Dialog
standard_dialogs.description: Shown when files are locked by running applications.

standard_dialogs.name: Restart Manager Files In Use Dialog
standard_dialogs.description: Vista+ dialog for Restart Manager file conflicts.

standard_dialogs.name: Out of Disk Space Dialog
standard_dialogs.description: Shown when insufficient disk space is available.

standard_dialogs.name: Out of Rollback Disk Space Dialog
standard_dialogs.description: Shown when insufficient space for rollback.

standard_dialogs.name: Resume Dialog
standard_dialogs.description: Shown when resuming a suspended installation.

standard_dialogs.name: Wait for Costing Dialog
standard_dialogs.description: Shown while calculating disk space requirements.

customization_examples.name: Add launch checkbox to exit dialog
customization_examples.wix:
<Property Id="WIXUI_EXITDIALOGOPTIONALCHECKBOX" Value="1" />
<Property Id="WIXUI_EXITDIALOGOPTIONALCHECKBOXTEXT" Value="Launch [ProductName]" />
<Property Id="WixShellExecTarget" Value="[#MyApp.exe]" />
<CustomAction Id="LaunchApplication" DllEntry="WixShellExec" Impersonate="yes" BinaryRef="Wix4UtilCA_X86" />

customization_examples.name: Skip license dialog
customization_examples.wix:
<Publish Dialog="WelcomeDlg" Control="Next" Event="NewDialog" Value="InstallDirDlg">1</Publish>
<Publish Dialog="InstallDirDlg" Control="Back" Event="NewDialog" Value="WelcomeDlg">1</Publish>

usage_examples.name: WixUI_InstallDir with customization
usage_examples.wix:
<Package ...>
  <Property Id="WIXUI_INSTALLDIR" Value="INSTALLFOLDER" />
  <WixVariable Id="WixUILicenseRtf" Value="License.rtf" />
  <WixVariable Id="WixUIBannerBmp" Value="banner.bmp" />
  <WixVariable Id="WixUIDialogBmp" Value="dialog.bmp" />
  <UIRef Id="WixUI_InstallDir" />
</Package>
